%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Unlock all articles for the in-game guide.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Memory sticks will be replaced by rare PDAs when spawned.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Unlock all other available achievements.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]All there is to achieve has been achieved. The road has been long, but you've arrived at the end triumphant.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Destroy either 3 helicopters with small arms or 1 with an explosive.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Mi-2 "Hoplite" helicopters will appear in place of Mi-24 "Hind" helicopters.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Disable both the Miracle Machine and the Brain Scorcher.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stalkers are more likely to move through Yantar and Radar, possibly increasing their population in northern areas.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Detect a minimum of 50 artefacts.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]You have an increased chance of finding artefacts after an emission.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Possess 10,000,000 RU.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Traders are more willing to sell higher tier gear to you, even if you don't meet the goodwill requirements with their faction.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Deliver 50 PDAs to information brokers.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Brokers will now pay you a small bonus for any further PDAs delivered to them.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Deliver all 3 tool sets to a single technician.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]>Bonus items used in repairs are more effective.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Achieve the highest possible rank.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]You can recruit larger groups of followers to act as your companions.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Survive 25 emissions and psi-storms.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Each time a psy-storm or emission begins, there's a chance you will survive without taking cover.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Loot 100 stashes.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]You occasionally find more loot when searching stashes.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Kill 500 stalkers or make 50 surrender to you.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Surrendering stalkers may occasionally reveal the location of a second stash.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Visit all 33 locations in the Zone.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Receive coordinates for 3 unique stashes

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Kill 500 mutants or field dress 250 mutant parts.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]You are able to skin mutants much faster than normal.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Complete the 'Living Legend' storyline.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Unlock 'Renegades' as a playable faction.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Smash 200 boxes.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Boxes will have a 25% chance of containing more loot.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Disassemble 200 items.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]33% chance of obtaining an extra part from disassembling.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Craft 50 items.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Many advanced crafting recipes will require less components.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Reach a total of 5 hours of being in disguise.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Your actions while under disguise will draw less suspicion.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Complete the 'Mortal Sin' storyline.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Unlock 'Sin' as a playable faction.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Complete the 'Operation Afterglow' storyline.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Unlock 'UNISG' as a playable faction.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Capture half of the available territories.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]50,000 RU bonus.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Complete all three 'Lost to the Zone storylines in Ironman mode.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Major rank increase.

%c[pda_white] • Requirement(s):
 %c[ui_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Play on Story mode, complete all three "Lost to the Zone" storylines.
 %c[ui_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Ironman mode must be active since day 1 in the Zone, until the storlines are completed.
 %c[ui_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Play on the hardest gameplay and progression difficulties, without changing any of their settings.
 %c[ui_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Do not die more than once.
 %c[ui_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Never use debug mode.
 %c[pda_white] • Reward(s):
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Bragging rights.
